reviews.review_text: Packed this on a trip to Peru. It came in handy on those cool spring nights there, perfect for strolling in Lima. It‚Äôs not too light and not too heavy. Worked well with a simple outfit underneath
Love this duster! So comfy, slowly, cute with everything.
Great transitional piece!
Brought this to Mexico and wore it traveling so I could stay warm on the plane. It's so cute- can dress up any outfit and is a darling cover up.
Fun pattern. Very comfortable. Wore it to work and received many compliments.

I absolutely LOVED this kimono which had embroidered edging and so many different floral patterns. The kimono is very versatile that it can be worn as a throw on for kid drop-off with leggings and a tank or dressed up for a night on the town with a dress or shorts. There are so many incredible patterns in it that you can wear it in so many color ways. It's a lightweight, breathable fabric that just elevates any outfit. I even just love wearing it around the house. It is definitely a Daisy Jones & The Six piece and I am here for it!
The perfect addition to a simple outfit to help make it pop. Super comfortable and perfect for not cold/not hot either weather. Love it so much that I'm keeping it!
I love this duster, the fabrics are gorgeous, it can be layered and coordinated with so many different things, and it's super comfortable - perfect for a light spring layer.
True to size for a kimono/duster and a fun, colorful addition to my vacation wardrobe. Heavier fabric than I anticipated!

I love a statement piece that‚Äôs super comfortable and a low maintenance wear and this was it! I wore it to work multiple days and it dressed up the same simple outfits I always wear. Highly recommend! Very flowy and loose.
Quality is great! The materials felt nice and the embroidered edges make it feel elevated. You can wear this year round! I might buy this one too!

You can tell this piece is well-loved from the feeling of it, but it doesn‚Äôt look too worn by just looking at it. Wore to work, and my boss loved it. Easy to throw on and hide areas on days that you feel insecure. Great piece!
Great print and flowy fabric make this an easy to wear lounge item.
i wore with jeans once, my daughter wore to a dressy function over a mini dress for a super dramatic statement.
Love this! It goes with so much in my closet that I bought it. I had seen one similar styled with free people overalls and did the same. I got so many compliments.
This was absolutely adorable. If your arms are on the bigger side like mine, it may feel a little tight. I would have kept it if it had been just a pinch bigger!

I'm very short, so this was huge on me, but in a good way? It gives me "rich lady who dresses exclusively in flowy garments" vibes. I wore it with a t-shirt and jeans and I felt so dressed up. So tempted to buy it but the price is a little steep. Edit: What the heck, I'm keeping it.
So many compliments! Wore in the winter but Would be a perfect beach or pool cover up.
Great for any season and a fun statement!
I just rented it a second time‚Ä¶wore it on the plane to a beach vacation and wore it non stop there. Great over a dress, wear to the pool, cozy for morning coffee..10/10

reviews.review_title: Perfect statement Staple for My closet
reviews.review_text: I loveeeee this and bought it. It‚Äôs the perfect sophisticated pop with a black shirt, black jeans underneath. Its flowy and gorgeous!
I lived in this. Airplane, errands, WFH, and a night out. Absolutely love and had to keep!
Love this duster. So many cute details and colors.
Bought this for vacation lounging by the pool - 10/10!
Vibrant colors. I'm 5'5" and it hit me right above the ankle....perfect fit.
True to size and beautiful

This is a versatile piece to add pop to your wardrobe basics with a colorful layer - perfect for seasonal transitions. Looks great with jeans and shorts, and I also loved it over a simple black tank dress. It can be dressed up or worn casually. Great colors and print. I‚Äôm a size large (12 or 14) and this was roomy and flowy even though it‚Äôs a ‚Äúone size‚Äù piece. It fell to about 3-4 inches above my ankle, and I‚Äôm about 5‚Äô7‚Äù, so it may overwhelm a petite frame. I took one star off because the sleeves were a little short on me, more like 3/4 length than the full sleeves shown on the model.

I was worried this would be too hot for summer, but it worked great! Amazing for travel and anywhere with changing AC temps. The sleeves puffed out just enough to not lay on your skin and the material is very soft. Great shape but I would think it would look too small on taller, lankier people. At 5‚Äô4‚Äù, the wrist cinch was perfect and it fell 3 inches above my ankle. Wore with a salmon casual tunic and a navy silky tunic
Great fabric, pretty but a little too long & flowy for what I was wanting.

reviews.review_title: If you want a lot of Compliments, get this!
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure if I was going to like this but it caught my eye. Turns out, it catches everyones eye! I wore this to dinner and was stopped several times being asked where I got it! I liked it so much I bought it! Rent it and try, you'll feel fabulous!
All around great layer with beautiful colors. Lightweight material too!

I loved wearing this duster! It's so gorgeous and adds flair and beauty to any simple outfit. I threw it on over jeans and a white tank. It is definitely bold and makes a statement. It's also a lot of fabric and quite long so it might be overwhelming for people on the more petite side.
I wore this as a beach coverup on vacation and it was perfect! Even paired it with jeans a few times too. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend for anyone shorter if you don‚Äôt want it to touch the ground.
This so far has been my favorite item. May have to purchase or rent again. So many compliments
What a wonderful garment, i highly recommend purchasing to top off any looks you might have that need a lil something extra.
Too pretty to pass up!
I love this duster!!! It looks great with jeans and a t-shirt and over a formal wedding dress! I received SO many compliments every time I wore it, so many that I'm probably going to buy it.
Adorable
Got like a billion compliments. Wore it over everything! Almost purchased.
Love this! It‚Äôs all in the details. Well made, looks beautiful on. I wore this a lot. With dresses, jeans, even leggings to dress up a lounge look. Tons of compliments too.
Love this so much!

reviews.review_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
reviews.review_text: This was perfect wearing to the office with the black jumpsuit and taking to Costa Rica to wear with a bikini. Feels very bohemian and mysterious. I absolutely love it!
This is absolutely beautiful and high quality. I enjoyed renting it bc it‚Äôs something outside of my fashion comfort zone. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3 and I think it would touch the floor if I were any shorter

I rented this twice! I regretted sending it back the first time so I rented it again to purchase. It‚Äôs beautiful and can be worn with leggings and sneakers or dressed up with jeans! Easy to just throw on and look put together. So many compliments.
Soft, cute and a great cover up. Wore it in tulum!

Super cute layer, could be worn with shorts and a tank or with jeans. I rented for a vacation that ended up not happening and it didn‚Äôt really get any love because it was so cold at home. 

Almost purchased anyway, but the bust area was a little short on me. Where the tier ended it was sort of empire waisted on me and would‚Äôve been more flattering with a few more inches in that  section. I‚Äôm tall though so will vary. 

One size fits all and I‚Äôm tall and a size large so may be big on petite people.

reviews.review_title: Fit well for a ‚Äúone size fits all‚Äù
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm always suspicious of ‚Äúone size‚Äù garments as someone who is curvy and on the plus size fence (I wear a 14/large), but this actually fit surprisingly well! The wrists were a tad uncomfortable because the elastic was snug on my wrists and forearms as I moved around, but not so bad that I stopped wearing it.

reviews.review_title: Not for the 5‚Äô2‚Äùs of the world
reviews.review_text: Barefoot, the duster skims the floor. Also I don‚Äôt know if it is the amount of people who‚Äôve worn it but it is looking a bit dingy? Its loss it‚Äôs saturated color and starting to look muddy. Or maybe it‚Äôs suppose to look like it came from grandma‚Äôs closet of moth balls?
Loved this! Will rent again
I loved this kimono so much that I kept it! I used it as a cover hp and also with jeans and a blouse. It actually goes well with pretty much anything. Got many compliments in it.
Love this piece. Wore it to work and got compliments all day.

Almost kept this one! Loved it! Really packs some personality and takes a basic outfit to the next level. Feels artsy and romantic but also pulled together. Got so many compliments on this one. It was my husbands favorite and he rarely comments on clothes. Wore it 7 months pregnant with either black or white tops and bike shorts, leggings or jean shorts.
Seriously thinking about buying this one
So pretty over jeans or shorts
Loved this! Light and so fun!

I wore this a couple of times in NYC in late May and early June. It was eye catching and I received lots of compliments. It was perfect for the weather (70s) and flowed beautifully. Very unique and well made.

I loved this so much. In this case, I think that one size fits most is actually one size fits most. I am on the small end of plus sized and this was plenty big. I think people who are a few sizes bigger than me would still fit. It looks so cute over a simple t-shirt and jeans outfit. I'm going to wear it to my brother's rehearsal dinner this weekend over a slip dress. I love how it can give any outfit an eclectic flare.
Highly recommend
One of my favorite Nuuly pieces to date! Perfect for jeans and a tee shirt or layering over a swimsuit as a cover up. Love this!

reviews.review_title: Felt like a rich art collector
reviews.review_text: I loved this duster. I‚Äôm a tall tall girl (6 feet) and it was the perfect length on me. Was able to style so many ways. Shown here with flowy bright pants to keep the boho vibe.

reviews.review_title: YOU WILL LIVE IN THIS DUSTER
reviews.review_text: Wore this nonstop! Got tons of compliments! To work with a simple tank and jeans, as a light jacket when out running errands, post pilates workout class, camping in the mountains. I basically lived in this duster & was so sad to have to give it back.

Pros: You can wear this with a million different things and it makes everything look instantly stylish. I wore it to run errands, to dress up an outfit for Mother‚Äôs Day brunch, as a bathing suit cover up in Florida, on the plane to stay warm, and around the house. It would be a great addition to a summer wardrobe because it is the perfect lightweight throw on for those of us always a little chilled by the air conditioning. 

Only con: It is very long, so I definitely tripped on it a few times on steps.

I didn‚Äôt expect to like this so much. Rented to use as a cover up in Mexico but ended up wearing all month. As a robe in the am, over a dress, with jeans- it was so versatile and I got lots of compliments

This duster is great! You can pair it with basics really easily. I paired it with shorts and a shirt when the weather was warm and with black jeans,  a black shirt, and some dr. martens when it was chilly in SF.  Great great piece :D
Too small on the armpit area didn‚Äôt get to wear
really fun coverup to bring on vacation!
Loved this
I absolutely loved this duster. I got a lot of compliments. It fit right by my ankles (5‚Äô7‚Äù).
Total keeper - there was no way I was returning this one!! Bought it!
I wanted to like this - and it's really pretty and great quality.  It just ended up being too big and bulky.  It's a lot of material.  I'm 5'6, normally size 12/14.  Disappointed it didn't work.

reviews.review_title: Everyone should feel like an empress
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this duster

Loved it!! Paired with jeans, boots and wore several times. I received multiple compliments and loved the fit (it was long on me, but perfect). You can dress up or down. Came soooo close to keeping! Must try!
Wore this in my apartment almost every evening. Gave my PJs a nice pop of style while being a good layer for fall. Items like this are why I get (and love) my nuuly.
Cute but on the bigger side for petite people so I never ended up wearing it. But very cool piece!

I wore it shopping with some leggings and a shirt. It was chilly out. It is a thin piece but cute. I really like the sleeve detail and other details. I was wearing it shopping in Anthropology and saw it there!
Tried this on in store a couple of months ago but couldn‚Äôt pull the trigger because of the price. I was so thrilled to see it on here. It is so unique!!

I loved the colors on this. It fit just right for me, but it is one size so might be too small/long for others. I only wore this once as a swim suit cover up while on vacation, otherwise it was a bit too much for my everyday life.
Loved this!
I absolutely love this piece! I received it new.  It takes the simplest outfit and makes it so much more interesting.  I look forward to finding other ways to wear it before returning.
Pretty, unique and perfectly 70s
